info.title: NOMIS Mapping Service
info.description:
Manages mapping information between DPS services and NOMIS

APIs tagged by NOMIS to DPS Mapping lookup are designed to be used by other DPS services that need to transition data held in that service that was originally sourced from NOMIS by now needs to sourced from other DPS services.

Each domain requires their own role to access these APIs for instance NOMIS_DPS_MAPPING__LOCATIONS__R for location mapping lookups

All other APIs should be considered private to the NOMIS Migration and Synchronisation suite of services.

tags.name: NOMIS to DPS Mapping lookup
tags.description: APIs designed to be used by DPS services that need to map NOMIS ids stored in a DPS service to a sibling DPS domain service

put.summary: Creates a new set of adjudication punishment mapping and deletes ones no longer required
put.description: Creates a record of a DPS punishment id and NOMIS bookingId and sanction sequence. The ones that require deleting are removed NOMIS id. Requires NOMIS_ADJUDICATIONS

409.description: One of the punishment mappings already exist

post.summary: Creates a new set of adjudication punishment mapping
post.description: Creates a record of a DPS punishment id and NOMIS bookingId and sanction sequence. Requires NOMIS_ADJUDICATIONS

409.description: One of the punishment mappings already exist

put.summary: Creates or updates a prison person migration mapping
put.description: Creates or updates a mapping between nomis prisoner numbers and prison person history ids. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_PRISONPERSON

put.summary: Replaces all occurrences of the 'from' id with the 'to' id in the mapping table
put.description: Used for update after a prisoner number merge. Requires role NOMIS_NON_ASSOCIATIONS

200.description: Replacement made, or not present in table

400.description: Replacement would result in an NA with both prisoner numbers the same - requires manual intervention

put.summary: Creates a new set of court charge mapping and deletes ones no longer required
put.description: Creates a record of a DPS court charge id and NOMIS court charge id. The ones that require deleting are removed by NOMIS id. Requires NOMIS_COURT_SENTENCING

409.description: One of the court charge mappings already exist

post.summary: Creates a new single charge mapping
post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis offender charge ID and DPS charge ID. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_COURT_SENTENCING

409.description: Indicates a duplicate mapping has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

put.summary: Replaces all occurrences of the 'from' id with the 'to' id in the mapping table
put.description: Used for update after a prisoner number merge. Requires role ROLE_NOMIS_CASENOTES

200.description: Replacement made, or not present in table

put.summary: For all case notes with the given booking id in the mapping table, sets the offender no to the given 'to' id
put.description: Used for update after a booking has been moved from one offender to another. Returns the affected case notes. Requires role ROLE_NOMIS_CASENOTES

200.description: Replacement made, or not present in table

put.summary: Replaces a set of new alert mappings for a prisoner and removes mappings for the removed prisoner record
put.description: Replaces the mappings between all the nomis alert ids and dps alert id. Any mappings on the removed prisoner record are deleted. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_ALERTS

get.summary: Gets all alert mappings for a prisoner
get.description: Gets all the mapping between nomis alert ids and dps alert id related to specific prisoner created either via migration or synchronisation. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_ALERTS

put.summary: Replaces a set of new alert mapping for a prisoner
put.description: Replaces the mappings between all the nomis alert ids and dps alert id. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_ALERTS

post.summary: Creates a set of new alert mapping for a prisoner
post.description: Creates a mapping between all the nomis alert ids and dps alert id. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_ALERTS

409.description: Indicates a duplicate mapping has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

get.summary: get mapping
get.description: Retrieves a mapping by NOMIS id. Requires role NOMIS_ALERTS

404.description: Id does not exist in mapping table

put.description: Updates a mapping by NOMIS id setting a new NOMIS booking Id. Requires role NOMIS_ALERTS

404.description: Id does not exist in mapping table

get.summary: Get all activities mappings
get.description: Get all the mapping table rows. Should only be used in dev (in pre/prod this could return excessive data). Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

put.description: Updates a mapping between Nomis and Activities, including both the COURSE_ACTIVITY and COURSE_SCHEDULE. Requires NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description: The request is invalid, see response for details

404.description: An activity schedule mapping to update could not be found

post.summary: Creates a new activity mapping
post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis id and Activity service id. Requires NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description: Nomis or activity schedule ids already exist

get.summary: get room mappings for a prison
get.description: Retrieves  room mappings associated with a NOMIS prison id. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

post.summary: Creates a new room mapping
post.description: Creates a new room mapping. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

400.description: mapping for this nomis room and prison already exists

post.summary: Creates a new visit
post.description: Creates a new visit and decrements the visit balance. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

400.description: Nomis or VSIP ids already exist

409.description: Indicates a duplicate visit has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

delete.description: Deletes all rows from the the visit id table. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

parameters.name: onlyMigrated
parameters.description: if true delete mapping entries created by the migration process only (synchronisation records are unaffected)

get.summary: get all paged mappings
get.description: Retrieve all mappings . Results are paged.

delete.description: Deletes all rows from the the sentence adjustment mapping table. Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING
